prompt: Create a modern Follow/Followers List page with a clean white background and a minimalist Material Design aesthetic. The page should feature a top app bar with a black back arrow icon on the left, a centered title 'Followers' in bold black text, and a search icon on the right. Below the app bar, include two tab buttons labeled 'Following' and 'Followers' with rounded rectangular styling, where 'Followers' is selected (blue background, white text) and 'Following' is unselected (white background, blue text with a blue border). The main content area should display a scrollable list of user profiles, each with a circular profile picture (60px diameter, subtle shadow) on the left, followed by the user's display name in bold black text and username in smaller gray text below it. On the right, include a 'Follow' button with a blue background, white text, and rounded corners. Add subtle divider lines between list items and consistent 16px padding around the layout. Use a Column layout for the overall structure, with smooth transitions for tab selection.
